member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener
member.summary: Directs tracing or debugging output to a or to a , such as .

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with as the output recipient.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the stream as the recipient of the debugging and tracing output.
member.param: A that represents the stream the writes to.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener.#ctor(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified writer as recipient of the tracing or debugging output.
member.param: A that receives the output from the .

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener.Close
member.summary: Closes the so that it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes this object.
member.param: true to release managed resources; if false, has no effect.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener.Flush
member.summary: Flushes the output buffer for the .

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a message to this instance's .
member.param: A message to write.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a message to this instance's followed by a line terminator. The default line terminator is a carriage return followed by a line feed (\r\n).
member.param: A message to write.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener.Writer
member.summary: Gets or sets the text writer that receives the tracing or debugging output.
member.returns: A that represents the writer that receives the tracing or debugging output.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener
member.summary: Directs tracing or debugging output to a text writer, such as a stream writer, or to a stream, such as a file stream.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes to the specified output stream.
member.param: The to receive the output.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener.#ctor(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes to the specified text writer.
member.param: The to receive the output.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes to the specified file.
member.param: The name of the file to receive the output.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes to the specified output stream and has the specified name.
member.param: The to receive the output.
The name of the new instance of the trace listener.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener.#ctor(System.IO.TextWriter,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes to the specified text writer and has the specified name.
member.param: The to receive the output.
The name of the new instance of the trace listener.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes to the specified file and has the specified name.
member.param: The name of the file to receive the output.
The name of the new instance of the trace listener.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener.Delimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the delimiter for the delimited list.
member.returns: The delimiter for the delimited list.
member.exception: is set to an empty string ("").

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener.GetSupportedAttributes
member.summary: Returns the custom configuration file attribute supported by the delimited trace listener.
member.returns: A string array that contains the single value "delimiter".

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener.TraceData(System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache,System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the output file or stream.
member.param: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A name used to identify the output, typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
One of the values specifying the type of event that has caused the trace.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A data object to write to the output file or stream.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener.TraceData(System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache,System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType,System.Int32,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes trace information, an array of data objects, and event information to the output file or stream.
member.param: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A name used to identify the output, typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
One of the values specifying the type of event that has caused the trace.
A numeric identifier for the event.
An array of data objects to write to the output file or stream.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener.TraceEvent(System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache,System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Writes trace information, a message, and event information to the output file or stream.
member.param: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A name used to identify the output, typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
One of the values specifying the type of event that has caused the trace.
A numeric identifier for the event.
The trace message to write to the output file or stream.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DelimitedListTraceListener.TraceEvent(System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache,System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType,System.Int32,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes trace information, a formatted array of objects, and event information to the output file or stream.
member.param: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A name used to identify the output, typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
One of the values specifying the type of event that has caused the trace.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A format string that contains zero or more format items that correspond to objects in the args array.
An array containing zero or more objects to format.
